Hanabi strikes her opponent with several [[Gentle Fist]] moves, causing them to fall to the ground. Hanabi then goes to her father, Hiashi, and asks him how she did. Hiashi notices the opponent starts to get up, and with incredible speed finishes off the opponent.

[[pl:Jūken Shinan]]
